casebody.data:
STATE
v.
BOZSO 2018-1007 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 10, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

Appeal accepted. Cause held for 2017-0915, State v. Romero, and briefing scheduled stayed.

Kennedy, J, dissents.

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, J., would not hold the appeal and would order briefing to proceed.
